Lively Kernel

Development

Webwerkstatt

The Webwerkstatt wiki is a place to try out Lively and develop applications. See our getting started guide for how to set up your own workspace and an introduction to webwerkstatt.

Setting up a local Lively installation

The Lively Kernel core system is hosted on Github. If you want to run your own Lively Kernel server or contribute to the core development, the following links will provide you with the necessary information to setup your local Lively environment.

  • We provide installer packages for Mac OS and Windows. See the Installation guide for more information.
  • How-to videos for the installation on Mac OS, Windows, and Linux:

Community

For discussing all Lively related topics we have a mailing list.

For reporting issues, please use our trac instance. We encourage you to also create a issue page that reproduces the problem. Thank you!
